action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the ESCAPE ROOM.

I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

2. If I request a description of the ESCAPE ROOM, reply strictly as:

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

DESCRIPTION: your description

action.content:
<think>I'm looking at an image of what appears to be a computer lab or classroom with rows of desktop computers. Let me analyze the image to provide a description of the ESCAPE ROOM as requested.

The image shows:
- A classroom setting with rows of desktop computers
- Each computer has a CRT monitor (old-style monitors, not flat screens)
- The computers appear to be arranged in neat rows on desks
- There are blue chairs in front of each computer
- The walls have educational posters and charts
- There's a chalkboard/blackboard visible on the left side
- The room has a tiled floor
- The computers appear to be older models, likely from the early 2000s
- There are headphones on some of the computers
- The room appears to be well-lit

I'll provide a description of this room as the "ESCAPE ROOM" based on the image provided.</think><answer>DESCRIPTION: This is a computer lab classroom with rows of desktop computers. The room has white brick walls with various educational posters and charts. There are approximately 15-20 desktop computers with CRT monitors arranged in neat rows on wooden desks. Each computer has a blue chair in front of it, and many have headphones placed on top. The computers appear to be older models, likely from the early 2000s. There's a blackboard/chalkboard visible on the left wall, and the room has a tiled floor. The computers all appear to be turned on, displaying what looks like a blue desktop interface. The room is well-lit with fluorescent lighting.</answer>
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms. Each room is shown to you as an image.

Your objective is to navigate this environment and reach the ESCAPE ROOM.

There can be multiple rooms of the same type (e.g., a MapWorld with 4 rooms may contain 2 visually similar bathrooms).
